testcase.name: User wants some details about an order report
testcase.system-out: Given User is in Retail Login page..........................................passed And User Enters "admin" and "Admin@123" as valid username and password......passed When User click on Log in button............................................passed And User navigates to the Customer Order Report section.....................passed Given User Enters "Krishna Mohan"...........................................passed And Search for the Report...................................................passed Then The Report will show up in result section..............................passed

testcase.name: Change the Status of an existing order report
testcase.system-out: Given User is in Retail Login page..........................................passed And User Enters "admin" and "Admin@123" as valid username and password......passed When User click on Log in button............................................passed And User navigates to the Customer Order Report section.....................passed Given User Enters "Krishna Mohan"...........................................passed And Search for the Report...................................................passed When User clicks on edit button.............................................passed And Change the status from enabled to disable...............................passed When User search the history by IP..........................................passed Then Checks for the change..................................................passed
